mil7.5.9:1.2_0: “Yathā, mahārāja, varāho santattakaṭhite gimhasamaye sampatte udakaṁ upagacchati;
mil7.5.9:1.3_1: yoginā yogāvacarena dosena citte āluḷitakhalitavibbhantasantatte sītalāmatapaṇītamettābhāvanaṁ upagantabbaṁ.
mil7.5.9:1.4_0: Idaṁ, mahārāja, varāhassa paṭhamaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
mil7.5.9:2.1_1: varāho cikkhallamudakamupagantvā nāsikāya pathaviṁ khaṇitvā doṇiṁ katvā doṇikāya sayati;
mil7.5.9:2.2_0: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena mānase kāyaṁ nikkhipitvā ārammaṇantaragatena sayitabbaṁ.
mil7.5.9:2.3_0: Idaṁ, mahārāja, varāhassa dutiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
